lastRelease.name: Release-90
lastRelease.description: Triggered release for feed: uoc-feed package: uoc-web-ui version: 2.0.230201006-main.

inputs.script:
# Script for Adding Config.js
agtdir="$(Agent.TempDirectory)"
arsdir="$(ArtifactStagingDirectory)"
ls -al $agtdir
ls -al $arsdir
atifact=$(find /home/obb-agent/myagent/UNISTAD -type d -name "uoc-web-ui")
echo $atifact
sudo mkdir $atifact/assets
sudo mkdir $atifact/assets/js
cd $agtdir
ls -al
sudo mv test-uoc-config.js $atifact/assets/js/config.js
cd $atifact/
ls -al
sudo apt install zip -y
ls -al
sudo zip -u *.zip assets/js/config.js
sudo zipinfo *.zip
sudo rm -rf assets

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment.

inputs.name: WebAppName
inputs.label: App service name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or select the name of an existing Azure App Service.

inputs.name: DockerNamespace
inputs.label: Registry or Namespace
inputs.helpMarkDown:
A globally unique top-level domain name for your specific registry or namespace.
Note: Fully qualified image name will be of the format: '`/`:`'. For example, 'myregistry.azurecr.io/nginx:latest'.

inputs.name: DockerRepository
inputs.label: Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Name of the repository where the container images are stored.
Note: Fully qualified image name will be of the format: '`/`:`'. For example, 'myregistry.azurecr.io/nginx:latest'.

inputs.name: StartupCommand
inputs.label: Startup command
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Enter the start up command. For ex.
dotnet run
dotnet filename.dll
inputs.visibleRule: WebAppKind = webAppLinux || WebAppKind = webAppContainer || WebAppkind = functionAppContainer || WebAppKind = functionAppLinux

inputs.script:
# Script for Adding Config.js
agtdir="$(Agent.TempDirectory)"
arsdir="$(ArtifactStagingDirectory)"
ls -al $agtdir
ls -al $arsdir
sudo mkdir /home/obuoc-test2/myagent/UNISTAD/r1/a/uoc-web-ui/assets
sudo mkdir /home/obuoc-test2/myagent/UNISTAD/r1/a/uoc-web-ui/assets/js
cd $agtdir
ls -al
sudo mv test2-uoc-config.js /home/obuoc-test2/myagent/UNISTAD/r1/a/uoc-web-ui/assets/js/config.js
cd /home/obuoc-test2/myagent/UNISTAD/r1/a/
ls -al
sudo apt install zip -y
cd uoc-web-ui/
ls -al
sudo zip -u *.zip assets/js/config.js
sudo zipinfo *.zip
sudo rm -rf assets

cat << EOF > result.csv
﻿Environment ,Current Release Version
TEST2 ,$(Test2_Release_Version)
EOF

ls -la

curl -sL https://aka.ms/InstallAzureCLIDeb | sudo bash
echo -e "########################################"
azure-cli --version 
echo -e "########################################"
sudo apt install python3-pip -y
sudo pip install pytablewriter
sudo pip install pytablereader

cat << EOF > final_new.py
import json
import pytablewriter
writer = pytablewriter.MarkdownTableWriter()
writer.from_csv("result.csv")
outF = open("obuoc-test2-readme.md", "w")
outF.write(writer.dumps())
outF.close()
EOF

python3 final_new.py
sed -i 's/# result/ /g' obuoc-test2-readme.md
az storage blob upload --account-name versionchecking --account-key NRXj7zqHLZC1afPjm0JdVQ+DTgRWdc87YhAoHSPLMQeZFKIay+LmLMMYlNyJW1CBGO/VyPE8t61IkxbrYW0yeQ== --container-name versioncheck -f obuoc-test2-readme.md -n obuoc-test2-readme.md
